body.name: Hibbent 10 pieces Toilet Seat Bumpers for Bidet, Strong Adhesive Toilet Seat Bumpers for Use with Bidet Attachment, Universal Buffer Toilet Lid Rubber Bumpers, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 30 mins
features: 【2 Height Options】 Enhance your bidet experience with the Hibbent toilet seat bumper kit - includes 10 pieces with two thickness options. Each bumper features TPE pads in two sizes: The lower pad measures 0.63 inches (1.6 cm), while the higher one is 0.75 inches (1.9 cm). Experience enhanced comfort and stability with our professional-grade solution.

【2 Kinds of Shapes】 The Hibbent toilet seat bumpers come in two different shapes: six oblong pieces and four round pieces, allowing you to choose the ideal shape for a seamless fit on various toilet seats.

【High Quality Material】 The toilet seat bumper, which is made of ABS on a white top and TPE on the gray bottom, provides sturdy support for the seat. EVA cotton comes with an effective self-adhesive strip to ensure safe placement.

【Simple to Use】 After installing the bidet attachment, there may be a space between the toilet seat ring and the bowl. To fix, simply clean and dry the toilet seat, remove the adhesive backing of the toilet seat bumpers, attach it to the toilet seat ring, and press firmly. Ready for use in just 10 minutes after installation.

【Universal Fit and Design】 The Toilet Seat Bumper is designed for most toilet seat covers for consistent use. They're great at reducing noise and enhancing lid stability, and prevent damage to the toilet lid caused by bidet attachment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far i ve replaced 3 times. They tend to fall off n not seeing it in toilet i flushed it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are solid, and the adhesion is great if you put them on a clean surface. I cleaned with isopropyl before installing and you would need a pry bar to remove. They are pretty thick though. I wish they were thinner but if you look at the details (and the questions, someone was nice enough to do a print) you will see that you pretty much get a 1/2 inch lift which is a lot. I was thinking about whether I could cut them down, but I actually am going to lift the mounting of the toilet set so I can keep these bumpers as it is easier to put a spacer under the seat than any other option since I can't get the original bumpers. They are very nice, just thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was thinking because of the humidity and chance of water splash when cleaning that they would not hold. Wrong! The glue is strong and they are just the right thickness I needed. My seat is padded and a good, more expensive one. However the pads broke and needed being replaced. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be careful with the glue adhesion wipes
reviews.reviewText: They do the job, they lift the toilet seat up so the bidet doesn’t get stuck. Easy to install. The wipes that come in the package to promote adhesion are some kind of very powerful smelling chemical. I had to turn the fan on in the bathroom and vent the room after using them. Definitely make sure the room is well ventilated. I also washed the stuff off my fingers right after using the wipe and had to dry my hands on my shirt, which left bleached stains on my shirt. My fault, I know, but I would have liked some kind of warning on what the wipes were and to keep them away from clothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a Clear Rear Bidet Attachment for Toilet about 6 months ago and new that I would need something to support the toilet seat once it was in place. These have 2 different size bumpers for hardware. Use the bigger bumpers in the back of the toilet seat and the smaller ones to the front. I used all the hardware devices, placing the longer ones at the 3, 6, 7:30, and 10:30 positions. The round supports went in between the long ones. The seat has not broken yet :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I ordered these as I have a bidet in an RV, so the seat sits up quite a bit higher than normal. These are adjustable so I can make it work, right?!NOT TRUE. These exist as a single level. SINGLE height. Too short for my needs actually. The adjustable part is a flat rubber end, or a slightly curved end. So, about 1/2 of a centimeter? Yeah, totally adjustable.OTHERWISE these are sturdy, and the adhesion stickers AND prep pad are really good. I used the pad and a spare sticker that they included. The main component however was useless to me. Not happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I'd bought a bidet, which I love, but I discovered after I installed it (and discarded the bumpers as unnecessary) that I probably did need to raise the seat a bit. So I called the company and they sent me to get these.The adhesive is really strong. I definitely recommend that you balance them on the toilet, then drop the seat onto them, though. I put the first one on the seat, then realized that I missed the rim of the bowl and had to move it. It's actually stuck pretty well, even after having been moved twice. But do it right the first time. Learn from my mistakes.I'm pleased with the quality, the packaging (minimal), and the way they work. I'll definitely buy this set again when I move and need to reinstall the bidet.
The seat bumpers have completely prevented the toilet seat from slipping back and forth. We have an after-market bidet, and the bumpers make all the difference in comfort and safety.
A bett adhesive needs to be used, they fall off after a while
Great for stability when you have a bidet seat attachment
Product is good but too big.. please check the size.. it did not fit on mine

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install and stable. Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I received my bidet seat 2 months ago and am fully satisfied. I installed it myself and it didn't take very long although I don't have any experience in fixing toilets. I weigh over 200pds and the seat hadn't moved although I have to move sideways à little when cleaning after a poop. The original seat from my (quite new) toilet used to move à lot and since the bolts that come with modern toilet seats are plastic... Well, this seat is really stable. And although I live in a cold winter climat, and the water is really cold,q I feel so much cleaner. It's "refreshing"(understatement, lol ) No more toilet paper to buy, although I do use home made washable toilet cloths to dry myseĺf.
